Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review compliance documentation for fund registration, focusing on SEC requirements and previous fund registrations for reference.
Meet with @comp-1 to discuss the scope of compliance documentation needed for fund registration, including any specific SEC regulations that apply to market-neutral statistical arbitrage funds.
Outline required documentation, starting with Form N-1A and Form ADV. Identify sections that need detailed input from other teams (e.g., CIO for investment strategy).
Draft initial sections of Form N-1A, focusing on the fund's investment objectives and strategies. Cross-reference with @cio-1 for accuracy.
Continue drafting Form N-1A, focusing on risk factors and fee structures. Collaborate with @facc-1 and @facc-2 to ensure all financial disclosures are accurate.
Set up a compliance timeline for document preparation, including internal review deadlines and SEC submission targets. Share with @pm-1 for project tracking.
Review initial drafts with @legal-1 to ensure all legal requirements are met. Discuss any potential regulatory hurdles.
Wrap up the day by updating the compliance documentation tracker and sending a summary email to @comp-1, @pm-1, and @cio-1 with progress and next steps.
